txt.en: There is mud here! Did someone go through the gap?
Search for clues
Search for clues
The fallen statue is located in Amd창n.\n\nLook for clues near the broken statue.

'Three guards for one shift, hmmm. And one of them is ill, you say? That is very interesting, for my own reason for not being alert last night... well, was exactly the same as his. I wonder if some illness is spreading through the camp. That would be a disaster, with all of us in such close quarters. I am fine today, however. I also thought it was something I ate.\n\n'And what is this about Zebena seeing a ghost?! Nonsense. There must be some other explanation! Please, my friend, examine the area where this so-called ghost was seen. There must be more to this!'
The wall is near the broken statue in Amd창n.\n\nLook for more clues along the wall.
The footprints lead to a gap in the wall
